title: Uri Levine, Co-Founder Of Waze
teaser: Host Jessica Harris talks to the co-founder of crowd-sourced navigation app Waze. Harris also talks with Jonathan Cedar, founder of Biolite.
contentencoded:
Host Jessica Harris talks to the co-founder of crowd-sourced navigation app Waze. Harris also talks with Jonathan Cedar, founder of Biolite.
